sentences.en: A scene of desolation met the eye on every side.
A sense of desolation overwhelmed me.
But I see nothing of this desolation . All around me are abundant harvests.
sentences.cn: 看到的只是万紫千红的丰收景色和奋发蓬勃的繁荣气象.

sentences.en: Everywhere a scene of desolation meets the eye.
Far and wide lay a ruined country, yielding nothing but desolation.
sentences.cn: 残破的农村四面伸展;除了荒凉之外再也生产不出什么.

sentences.en: Far and wide lay a ruined coutry, yielding nothing but desolation.
sentences.cn: 残破的乡村平躺在广远的土地上, 并不生产什么,只是一片荒凉.

sentences.en: He found the old house in complete desolation.
sentences.cn: 他发现那间旧房子十分荒凉.

sentences.en: Her life was becoming a desolation.
sentences.cn: 她的生活越来越孤立无援了.

sentences.en: How can you live in such desolation?
sentences.cn: 你怎么能住在这种荒凉的地方?

sentences.en: Kozelek expresses his sense of desolation absolutely without self-pity.
sentences.cn: 科泽莱克不带一丝顾影自怜地表达了自己的凄凉悲怆之感。

sentences.en: She says the army left desolation and death through the whole of northern Morazan.
sentences.cn: 她说军队在整个莫拉桑省北部留下了满目疮痍和遍野横尸。

sentences.en: The main street was already nearly deserted, its bright street lamps increasing his sense of desolation.
sentences.cn: 到了大街上,行人已少, 可是街灯很亮,他更觉得空旷渺茫,不知道往哪里去好了.

sentences.en: We couldn't stay out there in that desolation another day.
sentences.cn: 在那个荒凉的地方我们一天也呆不下去了.

sentences.en: We looked out upon a scene of desolation and ruin.
sentences.cn: 我们放眼望去，眼前是一片荒凉的废墟。

trans.tran_en: If you refer to desolation in a place, you mean that it is empty and frightening, for example, because it has been destroyed by a violent force or army
